items.sentence: It\'s easy to misinterpret the actions and intentions of others.
Tom told me he was planning to go on a cycling trip next summer.
We have squash, tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots, okra and potatoes.
Tom found Mary\'s address written on a page in John\'s notebook.
Tom apologized to Mary for not doing what he was supposed to do.
Tom appreciates it when Mary comes to visit him in the hospital.
Tom asked Mary not to make any long-distance calls on his phone.
Tom asked Mary some stupid questions that she refused to answer.
I haven\'t decided yet whether I\'ll go to college or get a job.
Tom couldn\'t understand why Mary refused to even listen to him.
